metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Far From Heaven is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Far From Heaven is written in the key of B Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 6th most popular key among Minor keys and     the 14th most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.
